name: Vrindavan Charitable Trust
briefDescription: Vrindavan Charitable Trust is located in Thane, Maharashtra.We can make a big difference in our own small waysWhat are the vision, mission and objectives of VrindavanVrindavan was formed to work for the betterment of society. It seeks to spread awareness about environmentally-friendly practices and policies in the public and private sector. VISION•	To do everything we can to protect our fragile environment from further depletion.•	Create awareness and encourage people to adapt a more eco-friendly lifestyle •	Help under-privileged children and elderly live a better lifeMISSION•	Work for the environment and significantly reduce pollution levels by 2025•	Beautify 100 rivers in 10 years•	Plant as many trees as possible by 2025•	Promote the use of solar energy and help people adopt cleaner sources of energy0•	Reduce use of private vehicles and encourage pooling and sharing systems•	Take initiatives to reduce accidental deathsOBJECTIVES•	Provide local expertise to develop innovative and cost-effective solutions for specific environment problems at the grassroots •	Become a knowledge centre in areas such as energy, environment, natural resources management and sustainable development.•	Promote actions that protect the environment from dangerous anthropogenic interference.•	Organize, support and participate in policy dialogues, conferences, seminars, scientific reviews etc., on the environment•	Reduce environmental stress through activities such as tree plantations and river beautification; encourage use of public transport over private vehicles•	Provide a shelter for and improve living conditions of underprivileged sections of society, including children and the elderly. •	Provide education facilities for children lacking it •	Serve as a source of expertise and provide advisory services to governments, NGOs and companies to support decision-making that is environmentally-friendly.
